1. 每次开仓止损最大不超过本金的1/25（严守）
1. 除清仓操作外不进行市价委托

library(kableExtra)
tmp <- function(a, b) {
  rbind(a, data.frame(b))
}
dat <- Reduce(tmp, dat)
names(dat) <- c("开仓时间", "平仓时间", "合约", "仓位类型", "开仓均价", "平仓均价", "收益率")
kbl(dat, row.names = TRUE) %>%
  kable_paper(html_font = "Fira Mono") %>%
  scroll_box(width = "100%", height = "300px")
